Step: Check a package

Source: R/steps-rcmdcheck.R
step_rcmdcheck.Rd

Check a package using rcmdcheck, which ultimately calls R CMD check.

step_rcmdcheck(warnings_are_errors = TRUE, notes_are_errors = FALSE,
  args = "--no-manual --as-cran")

Arguments

warnings_are_errors

[flag]
Should warnings be treated as errors? Default: TRUE.
notes_are_errors

[flag]
Should notes be treated as errors? Default: FALSE.
args

[character]
Passed to [rcmdcheck::rcmdcheck()] (after splitting at spaces), default: "--no-manual --as-cran".

Contents

  • Arguments
